message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $10,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $12,000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, Alice.  $10,000 is a good start, but I'm really looking to stay under $9,000.  Would you consider $9,200?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I can do $9,800, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
